LandingPage.heroDescription: Shift is a modern, intuitive platform for managing employee schedules, time off, and shift swaps, powered by AI.
LandingPage.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage your team
LandingPage.featuresDescription: Our platform provides powerful tools to streamline your scheduling process and keep your team happy.
LandingPage.feature1Description: Easily create, manage, and view weekly schedules with a drag-and-drop interface. Keep track of everyone's shifts in one place.
LandingPage.feature2Description: Allow employees to request shift swaps with their colleagues, subject to manager approval.
LandingPage.feature3Description: Employees can request time off, and managers can approve or deny requests, all within the app.
LandingPage.feature4Description: Leverage AI to generate optimal shift plans based on employee availability, demand forecasts, and labor costs.

AboutPage.missionDescription: At Shift, we believe that managing employee schedules shouldn't be a complex and time-consuming task. Our mission is to provide an intuitive, powerful, and AI-driven platform that empowers businesses to create optimal schedules, manage time off seamlessly, and handle shift swaps with ease. We're dedicated to helping you save time, reduce costs, and keep your team happy.
AboutPage.meetTeamDescription: We are a passionate group of developers, designers, and innovators committed to building the future of workforce management.

PricingPage.title: Find the perfect plan for your team
PricingPage.description: Choose a plan that fits your needs. All plans come with a 14-day free trial.
PricingPage.freeTierDescription: For individuals and small teams just getting started.
PricingPage.starterTierDescription: For small teams that need more.
PricingPage.proTierDescription: For growing teams that need more power and flexibility.
PricingPage.businessTierDescription: For businesses that need advanced features and AI.
